text: Self-portrait The Self-portrait is a self-portrait painted by the artist Jacques-Louis David in 1794 whilst in prison at the hôtel des fermes for having supported the robespierristes. It was his third and last self-portrait - the second was the 1791 Aux trois collets (Uffizi, Florence). He gave it to his former student Jean-Baptiste Isabey and it then entered the collections of the Louvre in 1852 (inv. 3705). David, Jacques-Louis Category:Paintings of the Louvre by French artists category:Portrait paintings of the Louvre Category:Jacques-Louis David portraits David, Jacques-Louis
title: Self-portrait (David)
